description: V5 Test 3: LIFT Front Fields Structure

backFields.label: Test Purpose
backFields.value:
Test 3: LIFT Front Fields Structure

This test validates the V5 front-of-pass field structure:

Primary Field:
• Maturity Value ($3,780 USD)

Secondary Fields:
• Holder Name (Raul Hernandez)
• Phase Indicator (◉◉◉○○ Phase 3 of 5)

Auxiliary Fields:
• Series (2025Q4)
• Maturity Date (formatted with dateStyle)

All fields use correct ISO 8601 datetime format where dateStyle is specified.

backFields.label: Venue Details
backFields.value:
Bell Tower Hall
Frederick, Maryland

Walking distance from downtown Frederick. Parking available on-site.

backFields.label: Your Certificate
backFields.value: This LIFT Certificate represents your participation in Exchange Reserve's regenerative capital framework. As an Early Adopter, you have priority access to Impact Briefings and exclusive community events.

backFields.label: Contact
backFields.value:
hello@exchangereserve.org

Questions? Email us or visit:
https://exchangereserve.org

backFields.label: Test Verification
backFields.value:
This is Test 3 in the V5 isolation testing series.

Serial Number: V5-TEST-3-LIFT-FRONTFIELDS

locations.relevantText: Upcoming Impact Briefing at Bell Tower Hall — Capitol Fund Quarterly Update
